Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary  Reroute at  Roosevelt/Central Park
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Central Park, Douglas, Homan, and Roosevelt due to Police activity near Roosevelt/Central Park

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Central Park, Douglas, Homan, and Roosevelt  due to Police activity near Roosevelt /Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed near 59th
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing near the area of 59th due to a report of a minor fire at track level. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing near the area of 59th due to a report of a minor fire at track level. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: 

  • #3 King Drive
  • #4 Cottage Grove
  • #29 State
  • 59th 59th/61st

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
